physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph that is in black-and-white. A lady dressed in an ethnic Chinese costume is featured in the photograph. Her body is faced in the direction where the photograph was captured, but she is looking to the left. She is holding a hand fan on her right hand. She adorns earrings as well. There are some plants on the right hand side of the photograph.
sgcool_label_text: This photograph was taken by Chow Chee Seng. Chow was a regular contributor for local photography contests, and was a long time photo diagnostician at the print clinic organised by the Singapore Photographic Society.
subject_terms_1: studio portraits folk costume women (female humans)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Prints Ethnic costume Women
